<title

    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=616) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 200 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects.
name: Bloodline Resistance
